snippet: A new autonomy measure for the richest conferences is an acknowledgment that the amateur ideal is at this point just that: an ideal.
abstract: Editorial contends National Collegiate Athletic Assn vote to allow five richest conferences greater autonomy is acknowledgment that college sports must change; contends decision will benefit larger, richer institutions greatly, and that smaller schools will find it hard to recruit top talent; holds decision shows that amateur ideal is no longer viable due to commercialization of college sports.
lead_paragraph: A new autonomy measure for the richest conferences is an acknowledgment that the amateur ideal is at this point just that: an ideal.
